name: Forgiveness (itch) (XxsebastianxX7)
description: A story that talks about how difficult it is to achieve something but if you dedicate yourself you will achieve it, it will be an interactive in which the user will have to climb a mountain to achieve a goal of overcoming the loss of someone he loves. In the course of your journey you will see more people who gave up on the way. Along the way you will experience the 5 phases of overcoming: denial, anger, negotiation, depression and acceptance.
